h264.generic: ffmpeg -v error -stats -hwaccel auto -i "{file_input}" -c:v libx264 -c:a copy -b:v 2M -preset veryfast -pix_fmt yuv420p -s {resolution} -threads {threads} -n "{file_output}.mp4"
h264.darwin: ffmpeg -v error -stats -hwaccel auto -i "{file_input}" -c:v h264_videotoolbox -c:a copy -b:v 2M -preset veryfast -pix_fmt yuv420p -s {resolution} -threads {threads} -allow_sw 1 -n "{file_output}.mp4"

h264-nvidia.windows: ffmpeg -v error -stats -hwaccel cuda -i "{file_input}" -c:v h264_nvenc -c:a copy -b:v 2M -preset p1 -tune ll -pix_fmt yuv420p -s {resolution} -threads {threads} -n "{file_output}.mp4"
h264-nvidia.linux: ffmpeg -v error -stats -hwaccel cuda -i "{file_input}" -c:v h264_nvenc -c:a copy -b:v 2M -preset p1 -tune ll -pix_fmt yuv420p -s {resolution} -threads {threads} -n "{file_output}.mp4"

h264-amd.windows: ffmpeg -v error -stats -hwaccel auto -i "{file_input}" -c:v h264_amf -c:a copy -b:v 2M -pix_fmt yuv420p -s {resolution} -threads {threads} -n "{file_output}.mp4"
h264-amd.linux: ffmpeg -v error -stats -hwaccel auto -hwaccel_output_format vaapi -i "{file_input}" -c:v h264_vaapi -c:a copy -b:v 2M -maxrate 2M -vf "scale_vaapi=w={w}:h={h}:format=nv12" -threads {threads} -n "{file_output}.mp4"

h264-intel.windows: ffmpeg -v error -stats -hwaccel auto -i "{file_input}" -c:v h264_qsv -c:a copy -b:v 2M -pix_fmt nv12 -s {resolution} -threads {threads} -n "{file_output}.mp4"
h264-intel.linux: ffmpeg -v error -stats -hwaccel auto -hwaccel_output_format vaapi -i "{file_input}" -c:v h264_vaapi -c:a copy -b:v 2M -maxrate 2M -vf "scale_vaapi=w={w}:h={h}:format=nv12" -threads {threads} -n "{file_output}.mp4"

dnxhr.generic: ffmpeg -v error -stats -hwaccel auto -i "{file_input}" -c:v dnxhd -c:a copy -b:v 2M -profile:v dnxhr_lb -pix_fmt yuv420p -s {resolution} -threads {threads} -n "{file_output}.mov"

prores-proxy.generic: ffmpeg -v error -stats -hwaccel auto -i "{file_input}" -c:v prores -c:a copy -profile:v 0 -pix_fmt yuv420p -s {resolution} -threads {threads} -n "{file_output}.mov"
